languages.text: {n}Когда вы отстраняетесь, в глазах Маражая вспыхивает огонек. Он молчит, однако в его взгляде написано нечто, похожее на надежду.{/n}
{n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Когда вы отстраняетесь, в глазах Маражая вспыхивает огонек. Он молчит, однако в его взгляде написано нечто, похожее на надежду.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}
{n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}
{n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}
{n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

languages.text: {n}在你的嘴唇离开后，玛拉斋目光闪烁地盯着你。他什么都没说，但你从他的目光中看到了某种类似希冀的情绪。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}在你的嘴唇离开后，玛拉斋目光闪烁地盯着你。他什么都没说，但你从他的目光中看到了某种类似希冀的情绪。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando te apartas, una chispa brilla en los ojos de Marazhai. Guarda silencio, pero crees que en su mirada arde algo que podría pasar por esperanza.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te apartas, una chispa brilla en los ojos de Marazhai. Guarda silencio, pero crees que en su mirada arde algo que podría pasar por esperanza.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Il reste silencieux quand vous relâchez votre étreinte, mais vous distinguez comme un éclat d'espoir dans son regard.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Il reste silencieux quand vous relâchez votre étreinte, mais vous distinguez comme un éclat d'espoir dans son regard.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du dich entfernst, funkelt es in Marazhais Augen. Er ist still, aber du glaubst, in seinem Blick so etwas wie Hoffnung zu erkennen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich entfernst, funkelt es in Marazhais Augen. Er ist still, aber du glaubst, in seinem Blick so etwas wie Hoffnung zu erkennen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたが手を離すと、マラズハイの目に輝きが宿る。彼は沈黙しているが、そのまなざしの中に希望に似た何かがくすぶっているように感じられた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたが手を離すと、マラズハイの目に輝きが宿る。彼は沈黙しているが、そのまなざしの中に希望に似た何かがくすぶっているように感じられた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Geri çekildiğinde Marazhai'ın gözlerinde bir kıvılcımın parıltısını görüyorsun. Sessiz olsa da bakışlarında umudu andıran bir şeylerin içten içe alevlendiğini düşünüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}When you pull away, a spark gleams in Marazhai's eyes. He is silent, but you think something akin to hope smoulders in his gaze.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Geri çekildiğinde Marazhai'ın gözlerinde bir kıvılcımın parıltısını görüyorsun. Sessiz olsa da bakışlarında umudu andıran bir şeylerin içten içe alevlendiğini düşünüyorsun.{/n}
